group_1.textLeft: All three of us are going to leave the@Azalea House...

group_1.textRight: Leave? We're going to leave?
What?! Why, why, whyyy?! WHY?!

group_1.textLeft: Because the three of us have a new life ahead@of us. And it won't be a normal one.

group_1.textRight: Yes, your destiny will have a much wider@range of possibilities.

group_1.textLeft: We have no way of knowing what's in store@for us going forward...
There's a chance that we might cause@problems for everyone else.
So we need to erase all evidence that we@ever existed here.

group_1.textRight: We'll...disappear from the Azalea House...
N-nooo! I don't wanna leave!
Especially if we're gonna save it!

group_1.textLeft: That's why you should think for yourselves.@Don't just listen to me.
They're your contracts, not mine. I have no@say in them.

group_1.textRight: Leavin' our home behind, though...@I just...don't...!
I think it's the right thing to do.
Huh[chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]?!
I am. I think it's a good idea.
I was trying to decide myself, what I should@make a contract for...
I don't want to lose the Azalea House,@right?
Everything you said was for the sake of@protecting it.
So I think it's a good idea. It's a good@wish.
Ayame... You can wish for whatever you@want.
Hazuki...
Uuuhn! *Sob* *Whine*...
...@Aaahhh...
Fine, it's fine with me too... All that stuff@Konoha said...
You sure? I don't want to pressure you...
No, it's okay. You're not.
I always let you know if there's stuff@that's too hard for me to do.
C'mon, you know that!
I know. You're a straightforward girl.
All of this's a big mess in my head...
But, like, we're all gonna change, aren't we?
I feel it. Deep in my heart, I know already.
We can't ever come back...

group_1.textLeft: But there's one thing that won't change.
The three of us are still going to be@together, even after we leave!
No... We'll be even closer than ever!@We'll live together, hands held tight!
No matter what, we'll have each other!@We'll keep going, just us three!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
*Sob!* Konohaaa... Hazukiii...!

group_1.textLeft: I promise I'll never, ever let go of either@of you!

group_1.narration: After that, we settled on our wishes.
Ayame: "The Azalea House will last forever."@Me: "Eliminate all threats to it."
I had to choose that wish for myself.@I felt like it should be me that made it.
In the end, all of the rumors came to@light. The ones involved were caught, and@the vice director left the Azalea House,@which, of course, never got shut down.
And three new Magical Girls@left the Azalea House, too...
We left our most beloved place,@our home where we all grew up...
